data.prayer: Father, as people seek answers on the internet, please help them find the gospel in Tashkent City, Uzbekistan.
data.verse: So I say to you, ask, and it will be given to you; seek, and you will find; knock, and it will be opened to you.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Tashkent City, Uzbekistan
data.section_summary: What conditions of religion or environment could you pray for here?

data.prayer: Lord, help the people of Tashkent City, Uzbekistan to discover the essence of being a disciple, making disciples, and how to plant churches that multiply.
Spirit, teach those feeling unsafe in Tashkent City, Uzbekistan that they can hide under your wings
data.verse: He will cover you with his feathers, and under his wings you will find refuge; his faithfulness will be your shield and rampart.

data.prayer: Spirit, train the church of Tashkent City, Uzbekistan to trust with all their hearts, and you will make their paths straight.
data.verse: Trust in Yahweh with all your heart, and don’t lean on your own understanding. In all your ways acknowledge him, and he will make your paths straight.

data.prayer: Lord we ask you on behalf of the Avar people. 0.0% are known to be believers. Oh God, please share with them the great gift of your son Jesus and your kingdom.
Lord, make the 3,616 believers in Tashkent City to be brave and clear with the gospel to their 2,014,884 neighbors.
data.verse: So Paul and Barnabas spent considerable time there, speaking boldly for the Lord, who confirmed the message of his grace by enabling them to perform signs and wonders.

data.prayer: Father, put your Bible in the hands of the 1,971,541, who are far from you and live in this place.
data.verse: How can a young person stay on the path of purity? By living according to your Word. I seek you with all my heart; do not let me stray from your commands.

data.section_summary:
the state of Tashkent City, Uzbekistan has a population of 2,018,500.

We estimate Tashkent City has 3,616 people who might know Jesus, 43,343 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 1,971,541 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 558 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Spirit, instill a desire within the people of the state of Tashkent City to hide your Word in their heart.
data.verse: I have hidden your Word in my heart that I might not sin against you.
